abstract: Caterpillar’s proposed $7.6 billion push into mining equipment is being examined by the Justice Department’s antitrust unit.
snippet: Caterpillar’s proposed $7.6 billion push into mining equipment is being examined by the Justice Department’s antitrust unit.
lead_paragraph: Antitrust regulators have stepped up their scrutiny of Caterpillar’s proposed $7.6 billion acquisition of Bucyrus International.

headline.main: Regulators Seek More Data on Bucyrus Deal
